text: Yousuf ney kaha tumhen jo khana diya jata hai uss kay tumharay pass phonchney say pehlay hi mein tumhen iss ki tabeer batla doon ga. Yeh sab uss ilm ki badolat hai jo mujhay meray rab ney sikhaya hai mein ney unn logon ka mazhab chor diya hai jo Allah per eman nahi rakhtay aur aakhirat kay bhi munkir hain
